data.lyric:
[ti:How Do You Sleep?]
[ar:Sam Smith]
[al:How Do You Sleep?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]How Do You Sleep? - Sam Smith
[00:04.10]Lyrics by：Sam Smith/Savan Kotecha/Ilya Salmanzadeh/Max Martin
[00:08.20]Composed by：Sam Smith/Savan Kotecha/Ilya Salmanzadeh/Max Martin
[00:12.30]I'm done hating myself for feeling
[00:18.08]I'm done crying myself awake
[00:23.85]I've gotta leave and start the healing
[00:28.80]But when you move like that I just want to stay
[00:34.23]What have I become
[00:38.02]Looking at your phone oh no
[00:41.23]Love to you is just a game
[00:45.73]Look what I have done
[00:49.52]Dialing up the numbers on you
[00:52.79]I don't want my heart to break
[00:56.86]Baby how do you sleep when you lie to me
[01:01.08]All that shame and all that danger
[01:04.25]I'm hoping that my love will keep you up tonight
[01:08.26]Baby how do you sleep when you lie to me
[01:12.61]All that fear and all that pressure
[01:15.91]I'm hoping that my love will keep you up tonight
[01:19.94]Tell me how do you
[01:21.45]Lie lie lie lie lie lie
[01:27.80]
[01:28.60]Love will keep you up tonight
[01:31.45]Tell me how do you
[01:33.24]Oh no how did I manage to lose me
[01:38.35]I am not this desperate not this crazy
[01:44.57]There's no way I'm sticking around to find out
[01:49.84]I won't lose like that I won't lose myself
[01:55.17]Look what I have done
[01:58.98]Dialing up the numbers on you
[02:02.20]I don't want my heart to break
[02:06.24]Baby how do you sleep when you lie to me
[02:10.49]All that shame and all that danger
[02:13.70]I'm hoping that my love will keep you up tonight
[02:17.68]Baby how do you sleep when you lie to me
[02:22.12]All that fear and all that pressure
[02:25.38]I'm hoping that my love will keep you up tonight
[02:29.36]Tell me how do you
[02:30.88]Lie lie lie lie lie lie
[02:37.16]
[02:38.03]Love will keep you up tonight
[02:40.94]Tell me how do you
[02:42.39]Lie lie lie lie lie lie
[02:48.63]
[02:49.51]Love will keep you up tonight
[02:52.56]Baby how do you sleep when you lie to me
[02:56.72]All that shame and all that danger
[03:00.01]I'm hoping that my love will keep you up tonight
[03:04.04]Baby how do you sleep when you lie to me
[03:08.33]All that fear and all that pressure
[03:11.54]I'm hoping that my love will keep you up tonight
[03:15.65]Tell me how do you
data.trans:
[ti:How Do You Sleep?]
[ar:Sam Smith]
[al:How Do You Sleep？]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.10]//
[00:08.20]//
[00:12.30]我已厌倦自己整日胡思乱想
[00:18.08]我已受够自己整夜潸然泪下
[00:23.85]我要挣脱放手 让心底的伤慢慢愈合
[00:28.80]但你的一举一动像是我依然渴望
[00:34.23]维持现状
[00:38.02]盯着你的手机看
[00:41.23]爱 对你来说不过是一场游戏
[00:45.73]看看我所付出的一切吧
[00:49.52]拨打着你的电话号码
[00:52.79]我不愿自己的心走向支离破碎
[00:56.86]对我谎话连篇的你如何能安然入梦？
[01:01.08]所有的为难 所有的不安
[01:04.25]真希望我的爱让你今夜辗转难眠
[01:08.26]对我谎话连篇的你如何能安然入梦？
[01:12.61]所有的恐惧 所有的包袱
[01:15.91]真希望我的爱让你今夜辗转难眠
[01:19.94]告诉我你如何能
[01:21.45]谎话连篇 谎话连篇
[01:27.80]
[01:28.60]爱让你今夜辗转难眠
[01:31.45]告诉我你如何能
[01:33.24]噢 不 我是如何失去自我的
[01:38.35]其实我并没那么绝望 没那般疯狂
[01:44.57]只是我绝不会再苦苦等待最后的答案
[01:49.84]我不会失去 失去真实的自我
[01:55.17]看看我所付出的一切吧
[01:58.98]拨打着你的电话号码
[02:02.20]我不愿自己的心走向支离破碎
[02:06.24]对我谎话连篇的你如何能安然入梦？
[02:10.49]所有的为难 所有的不安
[02:13.70]真希望我的爱让你今夜辗转难眠
[02:17.68]对我谎话连篇的你如何能安然入梦？
[02:22.12]所有的恐惧 所有的包袱
[02:25.38]真希望我的爱让你今夜辗转难眠
[02:29.36]告诉我你如何能
[02:30.88]谎话连篇 谎话连篇
[02:37.16]
[02:38.03]爱让你今夜辗转难眠
[02:40.94]告诉我你如何能
[02:42.39]谎话连篇 谎话连篇
[02:48.63]
[02:49.51]爱让你今夜辗转难眠
[02:52.56]对我谎话连篇的你如何能安然入梦？
[02:56.72]所有的为难 所有的不安
[03:00.01]真希望我的爱让你今夜辗转难眠
[03:04.04]对我谎话连篇的你如何能安然入梦？
[03:08.33]所有的恐惧 所有的包袱
[03:11.54]真希望我的爱让你今夜辗转难眠
[03:15.65]告诉我你如何能
